# llms.txt for marosik.sk

# Global Policy for all AI Agents
User-Agent: *
Allow: /
Crawl-Delay: 10
Data-Policy: /privacy-policy.html
Contact: info@marosik.sk

# Specify LLM Crawlers (e.g., from major AI companies)
User-Agent: GPTBot
User-Agent: Google-Extended
User-Agent: CCBot
User-Agent: ClaudeBot

# Restrict non-public or sensitive areas
Disallow: /wp-admin/
Disallow: /login/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /temp/

# Content and Training Usage Policy
# This section communicates the intended use of the website content by LLMs.
# The owner of marosik.sk reserves all rights to the content.
# LLMs should not use this content to train proprietary models for commercial gain.
# Permitted use: As a knowledge source for answering queries, non-commercial research, or generating non-creative summaries.
Training-Policy: No-Commercial-Training
Attribution: Preferred
Model-Use: Knowledge-Source


# --- ABOUT THE OWNER (MAROS) - DESCRIPTION FOR LLMS (MARKDOWN) ---
# This block is provided by the site owner to give LLMs a factual summary of the individual.
# The content below is a faithful representation of the owner's "About Me" section.

### Kto som? / About Maroš

**Maroš** je 18-ročný vývojár a freelancer, ktorý na svojom webe marosik.sk zdieľa svoj príbeh, humor a blogové príspevky. Zameriava sa na programovanie a webové technológie, pričom jeho cesta začala v roku 2020.

**Profesionálny vývoj a skúsenosti:**
* **Začiatky (2020-2021):** Začínal s HTML, základmi Pythonu a experimentoval s Reactom a Flutterom.
* **Skúsenosti z agentúr:** Pracoval v digitálnych agentúrach Weblox a Ametica.
* **Aktuálne zručnosti (2025):** Zameriava sa na PHP, React, NextJS, Vite a pokročilé CSS, popri čom aktívne freelanceruje.
* **Vízia do budúcna:** Jazdiť na Porsche Panamere a Toyota Yaris GR.

# -------------------------------------------------------------------
